title.rendered: Match Education Delivers Nationwide Talent Diversity

content.rendered: Handshake_MatchEducation_CaseStudy

excerpt.rendered: Match Education needed a virtual recruitment platform to identify early talent across the country. They have achieved a 12x increase in brand reach, and a 10x increase in new hires from underrepresented groups.
